item.title: Welcome to FinOps Insight
item.description:
Welcome to my blog about FinOps and cloud cost optimization!

This is my first post. I’ll be sharing insights about:

- Cloud cost management

- FinOps best practices

- Cost optimization strategies

Stay tuned for more content!

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description:
# Welcome to FinOps Insight

This is my **first blog post** about FinOps! I’m excited to share my thoughts on cloud cost optimization.

## What is FinOps?

FinOps is a practice that brings *financial accountability* to cloud spending. Here are the key principles:

- Visibility into spending

- Cost optimization

- Team collaboration

You can [learn more here](https://finops.org).

“FinOps is about making money, not just saving it.” - Anonymous
